main event: A bright object was observed moving from East to West over Uruguay on September 8, 1958.
interesting points: The object changed color from white to reddish during the observation,The sighting lasted for 15 minutes before the object disappeared,The object was round in shape and glowed consistently,The observation was made by a witness familiar with conventional aircraft,No confirmed witnesses were listed in the reports provided.
witness description: Witness was a 32-year-old single judicial official.
